name: Uma Shankar
description: Uma Shankar, the founder of PUFC, stands as a legendary figure in the club's history. As a goalkeeper, he was exceptionalâ€”rarely conceding goals and earning the title 'The OG Wall of PUFC.' A natural captain who led with remarkable composure, his calm demeanor combined with the authority of a strict leader commands immense respect throughout the club. He remains the cornerstone upon which PUFC was built and continues to be a revered presence in the club.
